name: Prototype Psychic Blaster
effectText: You can discard this card; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Psychic monster from your hand or banishment. If this card is in your GY: You can pay 1000 LP, and banish 1 other Psychic monster from your GY; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Prototype Psychic Blaster" once per turn.
